info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:50PM EDT until August 29 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Mecklenburg County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Indian Land, or near Southwest Charlotte, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Uptown Charlotte, Central Charlotte, Southwest Charlotte, East Charlotte, Northwest Charlotte, Pineville, Freedom Park, The Plaza, Hidden Valley and Southpark Mall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
